name: Shiny, Circular Souvenir
description:
A tiny game about bottle caps, which are also tiny. 

Made for the March 2023 Bitsy Jam, which had the theme "Fermentation." When the theme of the jam was first revealed, the first thing I thought of was beer. And when I thought about beer, I thought of bottle caps. That's the long and short of how this project came to be.

Thank you for playing! And please be sure to check out other participants in the jam!
